entry.title: Morex Peppermint Wire Edge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morex
Type: Holiday & Seasonal
Price: 12.60 - 17.60 (2 variants)

A holiday favorite, Peppermint ribbon, is a wired ribbon featuring red and white stripes that remind us of our favorite sweet! Available in two popular widths, 1 1/2" & 2 1/2", for all of your crafting needs. Create beautifully decorated trees, wreaths, mantels, packages, holiday weddings, and even patriotic projects!
(Product Characteristic: Printed Pattern Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: Morex Candy Cane Stripe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morex
Type: Holiday & Seasonal
Price: 8.15

Candy Cane Stripe is a fabulous christmas pattern ribbon. This 7/8" wide grosgrain ribbon is a perfect accent to your holiday decorating and gift-wrapping needs. Available in 4 colorways: Green, Red, Holiday Red & Silver.
(Product Characteristic: Printed Pattern Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: Morex Kiss Me Wire Edge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morex
Type: Holiday & Seasonal
Price: 11.75 - 16.45 (2 variants)

Say no more, Just Kiss Me! For Valentine's day or any time, our new whimsical Kiss Me wire edge ribbon is available in two popular sizes. Sweet kisses are a perfect lipstick hot pink on a white satin background wired ribbon.
(Product Characteristic: Printed Pattern Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: Morex Forever More Wire Edge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morex
Type: Holiday & Seasonal
Price: 10.05 - 12.90 (2 variants)

You shall love Forever More! Top trending glistening red foil adores this sheer wired ribbon. Heart and swirls delight to add a modern twist to this Valentine pattern. Our new Forever More design is not only a great pattern, it is available in two popular sizes and a great value on a larger put up.
(Product Characteristic: Sheer Printed Pattern) / (Fabric Content: 98% Polyester 2% Wired)

entry.title: Morex Tender Heart
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morex
Type: Holiday & Seasonal
Price: 7.05

Tender Heart is a beautiful 5/8" grosgrain ribbon offered in pink or red with hot-pink and pink hearts. This romantic ribbon is perfect for Valentine's Day, special occasions, and any project where you want to show your love.
(Product Characteristic: Printed Pattern Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: Morex Lucky Shamrock
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morex
Type: Holiday & Seasonal
Price: 13.60

Lucky Shamrock is a printed grosgrain ribbon. Use this ribbon as a belt to complete that St. Patty's Day outfit. Everyone is Irish on St Patrick's Day! This style is available in printed green in 1 1/2" wide.
(Product Characteristic: Printed Pattern Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: JKM St. Patrick's Linen Delight Wire Edge
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Holiday & Seasonal
Price: 11.25 - 15.22 (2 variants)

Irish eyes will smile when they see this glitter accented clover ribbon on your projects. Wire edges for easy ribbon sculpting and bow making. Available in 1-1/2" and 2-1/2" widths.
(Product Characteristic: Printed Pattern Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Linen)
